dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Proud of his late father, a Knight in the Order of Agni, he trained in the long sword, becoming a formidable knight. Although he is well-known for his countless victories over other warriors, he still considers himself inexperienced and continues to train with great zeal.
dictionary.fusion:
I still have much to learn!
I must become stronger!
dictionary.summon:
So, you're calling on me, eh?
Alright then, I'll fight for you.
Just don't mess with my blade.

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Vargas achieved strength through countless battles, eventually joining the Order of Agni like his father before him. Soon after, however, he was defeated by a swordswoman of the Order of Lava. Ashamed, he then left to train again and intensify his technique.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm not yet satisfied!
I will become even stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
That's not all I've got!
I'll show you what I can do!
dictionary.summon:
It looks like you need me.
Alright, I'll give you a hand.
Let's just hope it's fun.

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Through harsh training, he mastered the use of a fire-encased long sword to make himself an even match to Lava, the swordswoman he once lost to. He's since become a drifter, not returning to the Order of Agni, but he still remains a legend.
dictionary.evolution:
My sword encased in fire
will burn this image into
your mind!
dictionary.fusion:
You wanna test my strength?
Just watch, I'll get
even stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Wanna know who I am, huh?
Alright then, lemme show you...
with my sword of fire!

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire. As the battle with the gods began, he was at the front, cutting them down.  His presence encouraged those terrified by the gods' strength, giving the humans a chance to counterattack. Continuing to lead the attack, Vargas, the savior of many, was counted as one of the Six Heroes and was feared by even the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
The gods are not to be feared!
Stick close to me!
dictionary.fusion:
More! Give me strength!
With this power we can take
on the gods!
dictionary.summon:
You have summonned me.
Now show me what kind of
summoner you are!

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire and one of the Six Heroes feared by even the gods. Even Vargas couldn't escape unscathed when faced with the impregnable forces of the gods. As he faded away, he heard Lava's distant voice, "Take my wings. I don't need them anymore." When he came to, he found blazing wings on his back, but Lava was nowhere in sight.
dictionary.evolution:
You can see my wings?
As long as I have these wings,
I shall not be defeated!
dictionary.fusion:
Holy flames, lift my wings!
I'll rule the fire that'll scorch the
gods to ashes, just watch!
dictionary.summon:
You've summoned me in this form.
You seem to know about me.
Let me show you what I've got!

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 화속성 10연속 데미지＆3턴 아군전체 공격 대폭  상승
sbb.name: 세이크리드 선샤인

dictionary.description: Along with his friend's wings, Vargas headed towards the center of the battle against the gods only to find a young girl who hated humans running rampant in the forest. He defeated the girl while still wounded, later regretting having taken her life even after all the damage she had caused. At that moment a knight appeared before him, leading to an intense duel in which Vargas would obtain powers greater than those of a god. However, after hearing the knight speak he stopped fighting back, losing his life to the blade that struck him as he smiled. With no one to defend it, the Agni empire began to crumble after this hero's death.
dictionary.evolution:
God, human, it doesn't matter!
I'll keep growing stronger to protect
everything precious to me!
dictionary.fusion:
Burn, Dandelga!
Set my soul ablaze,
and reduce all our enemies to ashes!
dictionary.summon:
My life's just a small price to pay.
My will shall burn forever
to light the future of the people!

extra skill.desc: 「패염검 단데르가」장착 시 전투중 모든능력 20%상승＆약점속성 부여 데미지 많이 상승
extra skill.name: 미래를 잇는 등화

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 14연속 데미지＆3턴 간 아군전체 공격력 대상승
sbb.name: 브레이블리 세이비어

ubb.desc: 적 전체에게 초강력한 화속성 24연속 데미지＆2턴 공격력 초절저하
ubb.name: 이그니드 바이저

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 화속성 2연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 염수조격

dictionary.description: A boy found in a huge jungle in the territory of the devastated Agni Empire. Completely feral, he could not even understand human language. However, his physical abilities were so strong that when attacked by a knight the boy held him off without injury. Mystery surrounds Zelgar, as even growing up in the jungle cannot explain his claws.
dictionary.fusion:
I get strong!
I want get more strong!
dictionary.summon:
You friend me?
Friend.
I go too.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 빛

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 2연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 염수조와격

dictionary.description: A boy found in a huge jungle in the territory of the devastated Agni Empire. After being taken in by the Agni Empire, from within himself awoke the ability to control beasts. Also, his unique claws grew in power and became strong enough to rip through armor. There are many rumors as to why he followed the Agni Empire, but the truth is unknown.
dictionary.evolution:
My body hot!
I feel power here!
dictionary.fusion:
Roar! Roar!
Power get hot!
I get strong!
dictionary.summon:
Me, Zegar.
You need me claws?
We friend.

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 7연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 연옥쌍와격

dictionary.description: The boy ounce found in a jungle in the Agni Empire territory grew up. Called the King of Beasts due to his control over animals, Zegar was very active in battle. Despite his power he retained a certain air of nobility which has led to many thinking he was the lost sixth imperial prince. This has, however, yet to be verified.
dictionary.evolution:
We go!
Me show you me
true strength!
dictionary.fusion:
Me power!
Firing up!
You feel cry of me soul?!
dictionary.summon:
Me you friend?
Me happy.
Me claws protect you.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 섬광

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 9연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 연옥쌍룡와격

dictionary.description: The boy ounce found in a jungle in the Agni Empire territory grew up. Rumors say that during the fierce battle with the gods, Zegar's powers grew stronger, producing claws of flames on his back. His incomparable strength that surpasses humans and beasts made him popular within the Agni Empire. Encouraged by the people's voices, Zegar strived to fight harder.
dictionary.evolution:
What you do to me!?
Why this burning feeling?
My claws are on fire!
dictionary.fusion:
Burn more!
Use me claws to
burn everything!
dictionary.summon:
You call me?
Me stronger than human and beast!
Me show you!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 섬광

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 12연속 데미지＆확률로 부상효과
bb.name: 혁염쌍신와격

dictionary.description: A great soldier who stopped the advances of the God Army as it invaded the Agni Empire during the great war with the gods. Zegar's courageous fighting was acknowledged by Emperor Orwen to such an extent that he granted Zegar an ancient blade of lore to fuse onto his claws. Using this new weapon called "Emperor Soul," Zegar followed every one of the emperor's commands gladly, prepared to lay his life on the line if necessary. However, he was unaware of the emperor's plans to flee the empire at the time.
dictionary.evolution:
Look at my bladed claws!
They're proof that his majesty
has acknowledged me!
dictionary.fusion:
My rage has been fueled
by the claws his majesty gave me!
I'll burn my enemies to a crisp!
dictionary.summon:
Are you willing to acknowledge
my power too?
I'll show you what my claws can do!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 데미지 대폭 상승＆크리티컬 시 부여 데미지 조금 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 예리한 칼날

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 16연속 데미지＆3턴 스파크 시 데미지と크리티컬률 상승
sbb.name: 황섬쌍옥휘염격

dictionary.description: Allegedly born from lava, this liquid-type demon radiates heat from its body. The lowest ranked of the demons, it is said to be the perfect sparring partner for new summoners. It prefers fiery places, but lacks a specific habitat. It causes fire when it appears, troubling those who come across it. Many Summoners choose it due to its cute appearance.
dictionary.fusion:
*Sizzle* I got stronger!
Hmm? *Sizzle* Did it just
get hotter!?
dictionary.summon:
*Sizzle* Let's go!
*Sizzle* Leave it to Burny!

dictionary.description: Only when Burny grows by consuming premium flames can it evolve into King Burny. By opening its mouth wide it can swallow a full-grown human in one bite. An intensely hot liquid is always wriggling around in its body, and sometimes pours out, causing fires. Extremely more powerful than Burny, it is probably the first formidable enemy a Summoner will face.
dictionary.evolution:
*Sizzle* How am I still hungry?
Quick! Give me something!
*Sizzle*
dictionary.fusion:
*Sizzle* My belly's full!
But I can still fit more!
*Sizzle*
dictionary.summon:
I'm hungry! *Sizzle*
I'll go with you,
so feed me! *Sizzle*

dictionary.description: A magician from the ruined Agni Empire, she went to a seminary to become a priestess as her family wished, but ran away in pursuit of magic. Then she studied fire magic on her own. She began to work as a magician in the imperial capital outskirts. At first, she was little more than a handywoman, but her reputation soon awarded her the rank of imperial scout.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey, check this out!
Haha, want it hotter!?
dictionary.summon:
You want to see my magic, right?
OK, let me show you the terror of fire.

dictionary.description: A magician from the ruined Agni Empire, her primary task in the imperial army was suppressing demons. Her fire magic was extremely potent against opposing elements, but she was never able to go beyond what she learned in books. Her struggle is recorded in her diary which also holds all of her magical knowledge, making it valuable for research even today.
dictionary.evolution:
Haha, want me to
light you up as well!?
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more fire!
It still isn't hot enough!
dictionary.summon:
You know of pyromancers?
Those who control fire...
That'd be me!

dictionary.description: A magician from the ruined Agni Empire. Worried she had reached the limits of self-study, she begged magicians all over the empire to teacher her, but no one was willing to. However, everything changed when one day a book of magic was delivered to her. In it was recorded various secret fire spells which she used to improve herself even further as a magician. She however remains curious as to who sent it to her.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm burning up!
A flame is burning inside me!
A new me is born!
dictionary.fusion:
This new flame around
me is still not enough!
Heat me up more!
dictionary.summon:
Wanna take a peak?
I guess I can show you...
Look, the magical abyss!

dictionary.description: Goblins are said to be fairies who became hideous demons after being possessed by evil spirits. The mischievous nature of their fairy hearts lead them to cause trouble for humans. Although individually weak, their pack nature, high reproduction ability, and knowledge of weapons allow them to continually trouble folks all over the world.
dictionary.fusion:
Ahaha!
I'm overflowing with power!
dictionary.summon:
You need me?
You need me that bad?
Hehe, I'll join you.

dictionary.description: While Goblins act in groups, there are always a few that stand out. These individuals are called Redcaps. They act as leaders, wear red hats, wield brutal weapons and command the other Goblins. One theory suggests they were initially infused with a higher amount of evil, but more research is needed to prove this.
dictionary.evolution:
My hat is my pride!
Wearing it, I become stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
How do you like my power now!
Impressive, isn't it!!
dictionary.summon:
Dye it red, you say?
If it's bloodshed you want,
then you have my blade!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

dictionary.description: Though Goblins usually gather in groups, there are a rare few highly able ones that go off on their own. These independent few actively perform dangerous feats in order to grow stronger, and they've even been observed wandering about to train. Oddly enough, there are few reports of these monsters causing damage, and despite being the wicked Goblins they are, some suggest that through self-discipline it's possible they've learned how to conduct themselves.
dictionary.evolution:
What a bother it is to be
surrounded by such weaklings.
I must grow stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
Mwa ha ha ha!
That's nice!
How easy it is to grow strong!
dictionary.summon:
You're what they call a Summoner?
Take me with you!
I grow stronger by the minute!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

dictionary.description: A bandit ruling the territories around the ruined Agni Empire. Raised in an orphanage, he left in a rage knowing that Imperial subsidies were being embezzled by a vicious official. He then made his name as a bandit, targeting detestable government officials, soldiers and merchants. Wielding dual-knives, he's known to hurt, but never kill his targets.
dictionary.fusion:
So you want more from me?
Hah! How's this!
dictionary.summon:
You need my help?
Alright, but in exchange,
I'll be taking a large reward.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 젤 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 부의 빛

dictionary.description: With a simple credo of "help the weak, crush the strong", he came to lead a large band of thieves around the ruined Agni Empire. Trading his knives for swords as the war with the gods began, he fought for the masses. Alas, the officials he hurt before interfered, leaving him with enemies among the gods and the empire, but he was still able to meet a heroic end.
dictionary.evolution:
Hehe, you can count on me!
I will save those who cannot
save themselves!
dictionary.fusion:
That's an interesting reward.
OK! I'll fight for you more!
dictionary.summon:
I know you know who I am,
and you know I'm expecting
a reward.

dictionary.description: A great thief who once claimed the ruined Agni Empire as his territory. Leon and his twin blades often found themselves pitted against the authority of gods and public officials. However, during this time he was held up as someone who fought against anyone that tormented humans. He paid little mind to this words, and further continued stealing as if to make sure it was known that he was still in fact a thief.
dictionary.evolution:
Once a thief, always a thief.
I've no interest in becoming
a hero or anything like that!
dictionary.fusion:
Not a bad reward.
I'll help you out in return
for your trouble.
dictionary.summon:
I'll always be a thief!
If you understand what I mean,
I'll lend you my power!

dictionary.description: A two-headed, mad dog. It has strong claws and fangs, and a snake for a tail. Both heads are always on the hunt. When it finds prey it closes in and brings it down with a powerful claw strike. It mostly enjoys human flesh, but as long as its prey is alive it seems to enjoy any fresh meat. Its mounted head is prized amongst those with unique tastes.
dictionary.fusion:
What's this?
Despite it's lack of flavor,
I'll partake.
dictionary.summon:
Grr! I am Orthos.
You might make a good
master for me.

dictionary.description: A three-headed beast and the guard dog of Hades. Often found in epic tales, it has sharp fangs that can tear not only flesh, but armor as well. Those attacked by it suffer damage that affects their very souls. None have been spotted in Grand Gaia, but their existence still concerns humans. Only those who have peaked into Hades itself have had the misfortune of running into it.
dictionary.evolution:
My fangs thirst for blood!
First, I will feed on you!
dictionary.fusion:
Puny human, what
have to offer me?
Give me what's mine!
dictionary.summon:
Human, I am Cerberus.
You would be wise to leave
here while you can.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 카르마 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 영혼의 빛

dictionary.description: A recently discovered snake-tailed demon beast with three heads, including those of a dog, a goat, and a dragon. It is written in ancient myth that each of its three heads devour the souls of the past, present, and future. Without witnesses of this creature, it was believed that the details regarding this beast in mythology were purely figurative. However, now that its existence has been confirmed, mythologists are turning back to the old legends to gather more information.
dictionary.evolution:
Time has gone and passed.
Let's reveal our existence
from a yet unknown future.
dictionary.fusion:
Heh heh heh...
Can you see it?
Your own fate?
dictionary.summon:
I can see your past.
I shall invite your present self
to witness the future you hope for!

dictionary.description: A small dragon ranked lowest among the fire dragon clan. Although it is technically a fire spirit, it's far fiercer than other spirits so it's usually classified as a fire dragon. It continuously attacks humans it encounters with its fire breath. Summoners who travel to the lava belts often bring along a Water Slime to avoid them, but it is unknown how effective that is.
dictionary.fusion:
Burn! Burn! My fire burns!
Burn hotter! Burn to ashes!
dictionary.summon:
*Hiss* I am Salamander.
You are my master.
I will follow you.

dictionary.description: A high-ranked fire spirit known as the King of Flames. Its name is legendary, but as there are no definite records some say it changes form at will, just like fire. Summoners are well aware of its fire dragon form that is often seen in Grand Gaia. Extremely intelligent, it understands human speech, yet hates meeting people. It will rarely speak to those it does not know.
dictionary.evolution:
I am the King of Flames?
I doubt your puny mind could
have imagined this!
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more fire!
I will turn the world into
a blazing inferno!
dictionary.summon:
I am Ifrit, King of Flames.
Show me gratitude, and I
will incinerate your foes.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

dictionary.description: A new species of dragon born when the great Ifrit granted his protection to some lower class dragons. Unlike other dragons they're born with incredible physical strength and the ability to manipulate fire. However since their intelligence develops slowly they're often quick to brutally attack other creatures around them. Additionally, it is also very difficult to tell how old they are as their physical appearance matures so quickly.
dictionary.evolution:
Behold my new form!
This is a combination of
both dragon and spirit!
dictionary.fusion:
Ha ha ha ha.
How interesting you are.
You please me.
dictionary.summon:
Oh ho ho ho ho.
You have summoned me.
Well, let me have a sniff.

dictionary.description: A fire dragon that lives in the Agni volcanoes. It is the only fire dragon that can fly. A Firedrake breathes fire and scorches the land with hellfire by flapping its wings. Although it understands human speech, its high intelligence makes it look down on humans, making it difficult to ally with. It only cooperates with those who pique its strong curiosity.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more fire.
This is not enough.
dictionary.summon:
You wish to ally with me?
Well then, let's test your
might!

dictionary.description: A fire dragon that lives in the Agni volcanoes. When a Firedrake ages an astounding number of years, he becomes the Dragon Graven. With absolute confidence in his strength, he desires to increase it even more. He looks down on humans but will aid one that he deems worthy. However, many have been burnt to ashes after asking for his assistance.
dictionary.evolution:
I used to hate humans,
but it seems there are a
few promising ones.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm, you will do.
Now feel the intense heat
from my breath!
dictionary.summon:
A human wants my help?
You look strong enough...
Let it be!

dictionary.description: A member of a species of dragons thought to be the oldest of all the fire dragons. Dalimaone's power is so outstanding it is said that the majority of other fire dragons are nothing more than poor imitations of him. However since their wild personalities made them so hard to train, research was conducted on how to breed more docile Dalimaones. Though some were born with more peaceful dispositions, their abilities in comparison were far weaker, leading many to theorize that the secret to their power may lie in their brutish personalities.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner rejoice.
Before you stands the
ruler of all fire dragons.
dictionary.fusion:
My power is rage!
Summoner, help me take my
power to its limit!
dictionary.summon:
All dragons are my children.
People call me the creator
of all fire dragons.

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 13연속 데미지＆확률로 부상＆약화효과
bb.name: 루인즈 브레스

dictionary.description: Lava from deep beneath the ground which gained a will of its own, manifesting itself in the form of a dragon. Its red-hot claws are hot enough to mold metal with a simple touch, and its blazing wings have the power to dry up entire oceans. The existence of this creature alone altered the topography of the world, alluding to the idea that it was not initially part of the gods' plans. When its amazing powers overflow to the surface, they solidify in an instant. It is said that in order to send this dangerous creature back to its home the gods had to make many a sacrifice.
dictionary.evolution:
Burn your heart.
Incinerate your soul.
It will glorify your existence!
dictionary.fusion:
Yes, throw these souls into the fire.
Make it hotter, and hotter!
Feed these souls to the flame!
dictionary.summon:
There's no use in self-doubt.
Just let your soul burn.
Life is but a dancing flame!

leader skill.desc: 화속성 유닛에게 받은 데미지 15%경감＆모든 유닛 공격력과 최대HP 20%상승
leader skill.name: 창세화신의 결계

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 16연속 데미지＆확률로 부상 약화효과＆3턴 아군전체 크리티컬률 상승
sbb.name: 이그니션 브레스

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 8연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 화룡멸장참

dictionary.description: The imperator of the Agni Imperial Army and brother of the emperor. His skill in the literary and military arts and impartial fairness earned him the trust of many soldiers. He was even more popular than his brother. However, he feared this and hid his face in public with an iron mask to show his loyalty. There are still countless more rumors about his face, however.
dictionary.fusion:
Even Summoners need training!
I will not forgive laziness!
dictionary.summon:
A summoner?
I will give you my strength,
developed in battle.

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 9연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 진 화룡멸장참

dictionary.description:
The Agni Imperial Army imperator and brother of the emperor.
It's said that he stood at the front lines when the gods invaded. As one of the two most popular people in the Empire, there are many plays based on him. However, rumors surround his death, such as he was assassinated by the emperor, who feared him, or that he was killed during a failed coup d'état.
dictionary.evolution:
You should follow me!
I will cut open a path!
dictionary.fusion:
A disciplined body and soul
will never betray you.
Never forget this.
dictionary.summon:
You want my help?
Hmm, alright.
I will lead your vanguard.

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 10연속 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 신룡멸장참

dictionary.description:
The Agni Imperial Army imperator and brother of the emperor.
It's said that he stood at the front lines when the gods invaded. However, just as he was leading the battle, the emperor ordered for his return. Upon his return, he saw his brother preparing to flee before his eyes. Since then, no one has seen him again.
dictionary.evolution:
Sadness, joy, loyalty, and suspicion
are all very powerful emotions!
You must take advantage of them all!
dictionary.fusion:
It's no use to train only your body.
You have to train your heart to be
useful in times of need!
dictionary.summon:
What am I fighting for?
You'll show me?
Then I shall pledge my sword to you!

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 16연속 데미지＆확률로 부상효과
bb.name: 신월멸화참

dictionary.description: Younger brother of the Agni Emperor. Once rumors that the emperor had turned his back on his country surfaced, Knight  Agni realized that he had lost his path. Having lost their leader, the Imperial Army lost all morale, leading to one defeat after another. When the God Army reached the city, it was set on destroying all its inhabitants until a group of knights suddenly appeared and repelled their attacks. Due to the imperial crest the leader of the knights bore on his armor, many speculate that the group was led by Knight Agni. However, no one knows whether it's true or not.
dictionary.evolution:
Value lies in your accomplishments.
So you shouldn't take for granted
how you get to them.
dictionary.fusion:
Be brave! Refine your skills!
Give your all in the last fight!
Don't let this era pass you by!
dictionary.summon:
If you have time to question the
meaning of battle, then swing your
sword! It'll make sense later!

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛 공격력 25%상승＆목속성 유닛에게 받은 데미지 15%경감
leader skill.name: 목신의 위광

sbb.desc: 적 전체에 강력한 화속성 21연속 데미지＆확률로 부상효과＆3턴 BB게이지 서서히 증가
sbb.name: 절 신마섬화기

dictionary.description:
A holy bird born from a volcano once every few millennia.
Usually half-human, half-bird in appearance, in battle it turns into a fireball to attack. In Grand Gaia this species has a rare fondness for humans, who otherwise have many enemies. They like human passion and self-confidence. Their tails can heal and it's said they appear near brave, injured soldiers.
dictionary.fusion:
More.
My fire needs to be fed.
dictionary.summon:
A stout heart beats fire.
This is why I entrust my
fire to you.

dictionary.description:
A holy bird born from a volcano once every few millennia.
It is a phoenix that has matured over the span of many years but still attacks by turning into a fireball. It allies with and defends those with ambition and a love of justice. History books speak of a Lava Phoenix appearing at the start of revolutions or coup d'états and aiding those who fight for justice.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner, you have a
good, stout heart.
I promise to defend you.
dictionary.fusion:
This newfound power...
I will use it to
protect you.
dictionary.summon:
You, Summoner who fights
with virtue and ambition...
Accept my protection.

dictionary.description:
A holy bird born from a volcano once every few millennia.
They are known as the Gods of the rare sacred birds.
Their bodies reach several thousand degrees when angry, burning enemies to ash. Said to be incarnations of gods because of their intelligence and sense of justice, all those who are vanquished by them are thought to have received the judgement of the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
My fire remains with those
who are virtuous.
You are one such person.
dictionary.fusion:
I completely accept
your passionate spirit.
dictionary.summon:
My sacred flame
exists to destroy evildoers.
My strength is your shield.

dictionary.description: The highest class of all Phoenixes, they are so close to being immortal that few care about growing stronger. However, there are still some who do care. These Phoenixes, having evolved into a higher form than other Phoenixes, are almost never seen. They seek strength out of their deep attachment to life as well as in order to face more powerful foes, leading many to theorize about them even today.
dictionary.evolution:
My bright flames carry hope.
Let's work together to vanquish
the darkness of despair.
dictionary.fusion:
My flames are pure power.
It is my place in life to protect
you and your allies.
dictionary.summon:
I am a growing light.
I illuminate the darkness.
Let me burn myself unto you.

sbb.desc: 3턴 아군전체 HP 서서히 대회복＆적 전체에게 화속성8연속 데미지
sbb.name: 카이저 피닉스

dictionary.description: An elite swordswoman from a top-secret project in the ruined Agni Empire. She was given harsh training from birth to make her the ultimate warrior. She was ranked highest in her order by age 14. Alas, as she was raised this way, she developed personality issues. She communicated only through commands which further distanced her from others.
dictionary.fusion:
My value is my strength.
Therefore, I need to become
stronger.
dictionary.summon:
You need my blade?
Promise me I'll face the
strongest and it's yours.

dictionary.description: An elite swordswoman from a top-secret project in the ruined Agni Empire. As a result of her special training, she hates contact with other people. However, the joy she felt from defeating Vargas, a promising new star in the order, spurred her to get closer to those she felt to be strong. Knights of the time where honored to be greeted by her.
dictionary.evolution:
Don't think I've reached
my limit just yet!
I can and will exceed!
dictionary.fusion:
Give me the strength
to take on even stronger foes!
dictionary.summon:
You must be strong
to have summoned me.
Let's burn it all!

dictionary.description: An elite swordswoman from a top-secret project in the ruined Agni Empire. Through many duels her strength is said to have reached that of a fire god. She used her strength well during the war with the gods and received massive support from those who needed her to defend the empire. However, rumor has it that she wanted a rematch with Vargas even more than a battle with the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
God or human,
I care not what form
my foe takes!
dictionary.fusion:
The inferno fuels my strength.
Burning souls, come to me!
dictionary.summon:
Make me your ally,
and I will show you a fire
which burns all in its way.

dictionary.description: An elite swordswoman from a top-secret project in the Agni Empire. Gravely injured in the battle with the gods, the emperor of the Agni Empire bestowed her with wings. As she tried to rest, having finished her duties, a new fire began to burn inside her. It was a feeling that was new to her. In in instant, the growing flames renewed her wings, inviting her back to the battlefied.
dictionary.evolution:
My bond with him has
granted me new wings.
Let us take to the sky!
dictionary.fusion:
My flames are my soul.
They will never go out,
even if my life should end!
dictionary.summon:
I can't stop this burning
feeling coming from inside me.
Accept my burning flames!

leader skill.desc: 화속성 유닛 공격력 50% 상승＆턴 경과로 BB게이지 증가
leader skill.name: 염황신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 12연속 데미지＆아군전체에 2턴 방어무시 공격부여
sbb.name: 라그나로크

dictionary.description: A small nymph thought to be born from fire, one of the six elements created by the gods. Lively and erratic, it is always scheming while floating around. It often appears before people, but since it is unpredictable and may suddenly attack, it's perceived as an nuisance by most. Yet as it can grant special powers to others, many Summoners search for this fairy.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Fire Nymph!
You're pretty interesting.
Can I follow you?

dictionary.description:
A spirit that rules fire, one of the six elements created by the gods. The fire on its head is said to lead those who are lost and it is thought of as a protector of travelers.
Conversely, it often appears at the scenes of fires, so some consider it an ill omen as well. Legend also speaks of its ability to awaken dormant power within others.
dictionary.summon:
I will go with you!
I've already decided!
I'm counting on you!

dictionary.description: Worshipers of the fire god brought this idol magically to life through prayer. A legendary relic, its existence was reconfirmed with the discovery of Lucius' Gate. It moves slowly, but the fire from its mouth can burn down anything a Summoner aims at it. It's said that the holy power it possesses can call forth mysterious powers in others.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Fire Idol.
If you know my true purpose,
I will go with you.

dictionary.description: Created by the gods, it embodies the power of fire. Ancient scripts say it appears with a column of fire and burns until all around it is ash. Reaching to the heavens, it is feared and worshipped as a messenger of the gods by tribes who believe it to have existed before the world was destroyed. Legend says that those who the gods deem worthy may receive their power.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Fire Totem.
I trust you'll make proper use
of this power I grant you.

dictionary.description: A former blacksmith from the ruined Agni Empire, Galant came from a long line of blacksmiths before him. He trained hard to be able to take over the family business becoming an outstanding blacksmith in the process, but he began acting out in rebelious ways in his teen years. Despite this behavior, he would still go into fits of anger when he saw others mistreating weapons and armaments, causing him to be ironically known as the Blacksmith.
dictionary.fusion:
What the!?
You wanna strengthen me!?
I dare you to try!!
dictionary.summon:
You need my power?
Sounds troublesome, but I guess
I've nothing better to do

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 빛

dictionary.description: A former blacksmith from the ruined Agni Empire, though once caught up in a life of mischief, upon the death of his beloved grandfather he decided he would continue his path towards becoming a professional blacksmith. As he honed his skills, he came to repeat his grandfather's words, "A Blacksmith's only job isn't to strengthen weapons and armor, but also to enhance the will and motivation of those that wield them."
dictionary.evolution:
I aim to be the greatest
blacksmith who ever lived!
You better not hold me back!
dictionary.fusion:
I now see the difference
in your training methods.
Who dare stands against me?
dictionary.summon:
Me, help you?
Who knows, maybe you and
I could get some work done.

dictionary.description: A former blacksmith from the ruined Agni Empire, Galant, fueled by his grandfather's final words, continued his training towards becoming an outstanding blacksmith. Often travelling abroad to procure his own materials, he one day came across a fragment from the heavens. It's unknown what methods he used to obtain it, but the helm he made with it remains an article of legend.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll show you the true skill
of a master blacksmith!
dictionary.fusion:
I like your methods.
Why not become my pupil and
become a blacksmith yourself?
dictionary.summon:
You've got quite the eye
for a mere Summoner!
Behold, God Arm's power!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 섬광

dictionary.description: A former blacksmith from the Agni Empire. Having completed his journey, Galant came back to his hometown to find it cowering in fear of the gods' invasion. Enraged by what he saw, he took to the volcano to forge a new weapon from the special ore he had acquired. It is said this massive weapon was covered in flames and able to break through the strongest of armor. Afterwards, it is said he handed his weapon off to his friend, a person who would later also come to be known as a hero.
dictionary.evolution:
You seem quite capable.
You require my help?
I guess I can pitch in!
dictionary.fusion:
You've gotta control the heat.
Too much heat is no good.
The right amount at the right time!
dictionary.summon:
I feel my power being drawn out.
I guess you must have the
spirit of a blacksmith afterall.

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 섬광

dictionary.description: Young girl and owner of Lan-Lan, a famous diner in the Agni Empire. Boasting plentiful portions and dishes cooked to perfection, Lan-Lan was an instant hit with customers. Never one to rest on her laurels, however, Lancia set out on a trip in search for new and exotic ingredients to add to her repertoire. It’s said that whenever she came across monsters on her travels, she could be heard humming as she calmly fired up her frying pan.
dictionary.fusion:
There’s nothing like a slap-up meal
to keep the body in tip-top shape!
Who’s for seconds?
dictionary.summon:
Succulent, mouth-watering vegetables!
Make lunchtime, Lan-Lan Time!
...Hmm? No advertising, you say!?

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 마음의 빛

dictionary.description: Young girl and owner of Lan-Lan, a famous diner in the Agni Empire. On her travels to discover new ingredients, Lancia stumbled across a coastal village that was being terrorized by the water dragon Legtos. Sympathizing with the starving villagers’ plight, Lancia challenged and defeated Legtos in a breathtaking fight. Her celebratory dish, Grilled Legtos, is said to have gone down well with the famished villagers.
dictionary.evolution:
Food knows no barriers!
Any ingredient can be tasty with
the right preparation and care.
dictionary.fusion:
The tastier the dish, the better it is for you,
that’s what I always say.
Fusion’s a hungry business!
dictionary.summon:
There’s nothing my fry pan
can’t fry.
That includes you, by the way!

dictionary.description: Young girl and owner of Lan-Lan, a famous diner in the Agni Empire. While traveling the globe in search of the ultimate dish, Lancia happened upon her dream ingredient in the form of Ramsa the God Phoenix. After a grueling battle, Ramsa admitted defeat and offered a portion of his flesh to Lancia as a token of peace. The dish Lancia created with it went down in history as the height of exquisite delicacies. Lacking the special ingredient, no one has been able to make it since.
dictionary.evolution:
I evolved!
And it’s all thanks to your love
and these wonderful ingredients.
dictionary.fusion:
Cooking is love, c’est amour!
Stir a little in and voilà:
an instant taste-bud sensation!
dictionary.summon:
Let’s fry this thing from
head to toe!
My mouth’s watering already!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 마음의 섬광

dictionary.description: A young girl who ran a restaurant in the ruined Agni Empire. Having returned to her hometown after finishing her journey looking for the best ingredients she could find, she saw the extent of the destruction from the invasion by the gods. She then headed directly to where Lan-Lan once stood and began cooking with her new ingredients. Though she was targeted because of how her amazing cuisine healed so many people, it is said she even cooked up some of the gods themselves.
dictionary.evolution:
Good food makes happy
people, don't you think?
My dishes are full of love!
dictionary.fusion:
It looks so delicious!
Would you like some, too?
Let's dig in!
dictionary.summon:
You might taste good, too.
Haha, just kidding!
Let's save everyone we can!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 HC출현률 대폭  상승＆BC 출현률 상승
leader skill.name: 심투의 섬광

sbb.desc: 아군전체 HP를 대회복＆ 3턴 공격력업＆아군전체를 서서히 회복
sbb.name: 신의 정식

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. A teacher at an esteemed seminary in Palmyna, Lorand was recruited by the knight Edea to join her expedition into the heart of the gods’ assault on Palmyna. Despite his foreboding appearance, Lorand was much loved and respected by his pupils. It is not widely known, but in his youth he used to go by the nickname “Inferno Gladiator”.
dictionary.fusion:
He who rushes will finish last.
Look beyond the present,
and focus on your long-term growth.
dictionary.summon:
So you’re a Summoner, eh?
With the right training,
you might just have what it takes.

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. Assuming the role of leader, Lorand set out with his companions on a mission to put an end to the gods’ assault on Palmyna. An exquisite fighter in spite of his old age, it is said that he burned his enemies to a crisp with a single swing of his sword. His comrade Dean affectionately referred to him as Gramps, much to Lorand’s dismay.
dictionary.evolution:
Do not be fooled by my age.
Back in my prime,
no one dared oppose me.
dictionary.fusion:
Failure changes a person.
He who has not yet failed
is yet to understand real change.
dictionary.summon:
Young Summoner.
Do you have what it takes to
harness my Inferno Blade?

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. When he finally came face to face with the leader of the gods, Lorand’s strength is said to have surpassed even that of his youth. He sliced through the enemy’s defenses, and cleaved a path for his comrades through their ranks. Ultimately, however, it wasn’t enough, and Palmyna’s forces were roundly obliterated. No one knows what happened to Lorand and his group.
dictionary.evolution:
I remember this feeling well...
Finally, another chance to rain
down fire upon the gods of this land.
dictionary.fusion:
There are those who fear death,
and those who prepare for it.
Which are you?
dictionary.summon:
Follow your heart’s true path.
I shall light the way to your future
with my Inferno Blade!

dictionary.description: One of four legendary warriors who fought to save Palmyna. After battling with Cardes, general of the gods, he regained consciousness on the plains of Palmyna. Wanting to know how the battled had ended and if his comrades were safe, he proceeded to the castle. However, upon arriving he saw that everything had been destroyed by the gods. It is said that ferociously wielding his flames he turned all the gods that remained in the city to ash.
dictionary.evolution:
These flames are my angst!
The brighter they burn,
the quicker all is scorched!
dictionary.fusion:
Usually the quieter someone is,
the more emotion they hold.
That emotion becomes power.
dictionary.summon:
My blade rages like a dragon!
It seems to react to your spirit.
Could this be fate, once more...

leader skill.desc: 화속성 유닛 공격력 50% 상승＆방어력 회복력 10% 상승
leader skill.name: 염벌신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 개인에게초 강력한 화속성8연속 데미지＆3턴 자신의 공격 방어 회복력이 대폭  상승
sbb.name: 염봉진천

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 파워 스매쉬

dictionary.description: An upright-walking monster with a pig's head that inhabits areas where the fire element is strong. They're very skillful despite their appearance, and they have the ability to use the heat from the volcano to cast iron and make the metal clubs they carry. However, this ability seems limited, and it's said that no one has ever seen them make anything besides metal clubs. No one knows why they only make metal clubs, with the most plausible theory being that there was once a blacksmith who taught them how to make them and nothing else.
dictionary.fusion:
Ho ho ho!!
Fusion, bwo ho ho!!
dictionary.summon:
Hmph, you Summon person,
my power... different?

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 데미지&확률로 부상 효과
bb.name: 파워 스트라이크

dictionary.description: An upright-walking monster with a pig's head that inhabits areas where the fire element is strong. Those with abilities that surpass other Orcs evolve into Ogres which then take charge of the rest. Ogres carry special-made metal clubs, said to have been handed down from leader to leader. It is said that this was created by a human blacksmith long ago, though because Ogres value it more than life itself, it is exceedingly hard to study.
dictionary.evolution:
I know human words.
Only few.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me power.
I help you.
You, friend.
dictionary.summon:
You, a Summoner?
Sure, I help.
From today, we friends!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 하트크리스탈 출현률 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 투쟁의 빛

dictionary.description: A mysterious old man thought to be a hermit living in the area around the La Veda Republic. Though he was a troubled man who enjoyed messing with travelers, it is said that he used his fire techniques to save his neighbors from monster attacks, and also gave away medicine when diseases had spread. Records have been found of him being taken in by nuns here and there, but his absurdly long life suggested by the length of time over which these events occured has many historical scholars worried.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmph, so this is fusion?
This is the first time I've
seen it.
dictionary.summon:
Break my curse and
I'll become a beautiful girl.
He he, I kid, I kid.

dictionary.description: A mysterious old man thought to be a hermit living in the area around the La Veda Republic. As parasitic an old man as he was, staring off with a clueless gaze as he unfairly challenged travellers, it is said that he granted beneficial advice to any who could solve his riddles. His knowledge was far reaching, and he was even well versed in matters lost to history. He eventually came to be known as the Mountaineer, and there is a credible rumor that he was often visited by an influential person from a certain country who wished to share in his knowledge.
dictionary.evolution:
Ho ho ho, you've done well
to enhance my abilities.
I now feel quite spry for my age.
dictionary.fusion:
I want the monster responsible
for recording all of creation.
You can procure one, yes?
dictionary.summon:
Hey there, Summoner.
I'll follow you around until I
can find a Phoenix feather.

dictionary.description: A curious creature that lives in a pot which is said to hold a power capable of dramatically changing the properties of fire. They're energetic and often cheerful, but due to their sometimes excessively high energy there are quite a lot of Summoners who are annoyed by them. Despite their cute appearance and bright personality, one must take extra caution when attempting to capture one as they attack fiercely when confronted. It seems they lose all of their energy if the horn on their head is touched.
dictionary.summon:
Oh, you found me!
Call me Fire Pot!
Nice to meet you!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal Ghost is said to have changed after having amassed extensive records on the element of fire. Known for their offensive way of speaking, they constantly vilify Summoners they come across before quickly running away. Because of this they are rarely seen, but they're also hard to forget. The element of fire is much stronger in them than in normal Metal Ghosts, and it's said that when fused to other fire types they provide loads more experience as well.
dictionary.summon:
Are you planning
on using me?
No! Please stop!!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal King is said to hold within its large body a huge collection of information on the element of fire. They have a friendly personality despite how rare they are so people often try to make friends with them, but you can never be sure if and when they might attack. Their outside appearance is of hot red-glowing metal, but it seems they're actually pleasantly cool to the touch, no different than a normal Metal King.
dictionary.evolution:
I've evolved?!
Impossssible!
You're trying to trick me!
dictionary.summon:
You wanna be my friend?
You wouldn't lie to me or
try and trick me, would you?

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. There's a rumor that if you look into one's eyes you can see a deep red fire burning in them, though no one knows how this was confirmed or who did it. Though one should feel lucky to encounter one, being they're just as rare as normal Metal Gods, they themselves aren't aware of this and just carelessly meander about, always thinking about how the weather will be the next day.
dictionary.summon:
I hope it's sunny tomorrow,
though I don't mind rain either.
What weather do you like?

dictionary.description: A dragoon from Julep Village located in Amdahl, she found an injured fire dragon in a cave near her house at a young age, and gained its trust by sheltering it until its wounds were healed. She found out later that the fire dragon had escaped from the dragoons of Palmyna, she then decided she'd learn dragoon techniques herself so she could protect the dragon. At first, afraid of exposing her to danger, the dragon refused her, but eventually he gave in to her enthusiasm and granted her the entirety of his knowledge.
dictionary.fusion:
I humbly receive this
token of good will.
dictionary.summon:
You need my help?
I'll help if you do.
That's why I came to you.

dictionary.description: A dragoon from Julep Village located in Amdahl, the dragoon techniques she learned from the fire dragon made her far stronger than an ordinary knight. She only used what she learned in protecting the dragon, but one day, upon returning to the fire dragon's cave, she found that he wasn't there. She decided then to go off on her own. She left to fulfill the words the fire dragon had left her with, "Use the power of the dragoon for your own sake."
dictionary.evolution:
You've probably no
use for these words, comrade...
But I must thank you.
dictionary.fusion:
Off to battle, are we?
Is that the reason for
this fusion?
dictionary.summon:
No need for useless words.
Concentrate on what you want.
More power!

dictionary.description: A dragoon from Julep Village located in Amdahl, with the dragoon techniques she learned from the fire dragon she wandered from country to country as a mercenary. She received invitations from many countries that were after her precious fighting skills, but she refused to go anywhere that didn't have a dragoon army. This was because all she was interested in was polishing her own dragoon techniques. Before long, she came to be known as the "Drake Lord" by the other dragoons.
dictionary.evolution:
Ha ha ha...
This somehow reminds me of
fighting alongside my friend.
dictionary.fusion:
I know I can get stronger.
I have the power,
I feel it in my bones.
dictionary.summon:
My sword is a beacon of hope.
It lights the way for those
who are lost in the darkness!

leader skill.desc: 턴 종료 후 대폭  BB게이지 증가
leader skill.name: 신격의 고동

dictionary.description: A dragoon from Julep Village located in Amdahl, she went back to her village to protect it from the gods' attack, only to find it half destroyed. Challenging the gods by herself, she soon reached her limits, and came to the realization that her life was over. However, just then a single fire dragon flew down from the sky. It placed her on its back as it laid waste to the god army with its flames. It's said that as she was crying, Aisha smiled at the dragon, with which she released an immense amount of power.
dictionary.evolution:
Let's flap our wings!
The sky is ours!
You can have some, too!
dictionary.fusion:
Effort is never wasted!
Even when you fail,
it always turns into something!
dictionary.summon:
There's nothing to fear!
My friend and I are
here to help!

leader skill.desc: 턴 경과 후 대폭  BB 게이지 증가
leader skill.name: 신격의 맥동

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 15연속 데미지＆3턴 크리티컬 확률 상승
sbb.name: 드래곤 웨이크

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 화속성 6연속 데미지＆3턴 공격에 화속성부여
bb.name: 선 프레임

dictionary.description: A self-proclaimed genius magician who works as a strategist for the knights of the Agni Empire. A narcissist with too much self-confidence, he's always after the most beautiful and perfect battle plans. His abilities as a magician were true enough, but his condescending attitude towards others let the soldiers to dislike him, and was given very few opportunities to go to the battlefield. It is said that because of this, he was ironically called "the undefeated strategist "by those around him. However, it seems that he really was really fond of the title, and would always announce it proudly.
dictionary.fusion:
Yeah, this is good!
If you make me stronger,
you know what will happen, right?
dictionary.summon:
It is the famed genius Summoner from the empire, Goltovah!
I will lend you my ingenuity!

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 화속성 8연속 데미지＆3턴 공격에 화속성부여
bb.name: 선 플레어

dictionary.description: A self-proclaimed genius magician who works as a strategist for the knights of the Agni Empire. His title as "the undefeated strategist" did not come from his own exploits, but it naturally made him even more full of himself. The one to finally put him in his place was Weiss, who was praised as a great army god in the Atharva Republic. Goltovah, having been completely beaten in strategy to the point of tears, ran away unscathed from the battlefield where the Agni forces were located. Using this experience as an opportunity, Goltovah began learning about the things that were truly important in his life.
dictionary.evolution:
The undefeated strategist!
It's the perfect title for me!
Hey, you think so too, right?
dictionary.fusion:
Yeah, put more of that over here and...
Oh, I don't really know!
Just make sure you make my Fusion beautiful.
dictionary.summon:
The main star of the Agni Knight's, the undefeated strategist, Goltovah!
Hehe, I'll lend you a hand.

dictionary.description: A Unit modeled after Seria, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall's Demon Slayers. The power this Warlord ranked Arena fighter holds is enough to knock out normal enemies in a single blow. One can feel her elegance as she swings her large, but thin, sword. However, her way of speaking is just as crude as the real Seria, rumors of which have spread all across Elgaia.
dictionary.fusion:
I definitely feel stronger.
Unfortunately, you seem to
be as clueless as always.
dictionary.summon:
You're gonna summon me?
You gotta be kidding!
You're not? Hmm, what to do...

dictionary.description: A Unit modeled after Seria, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall's Demon Slayers. Her abilities are highly praised by even the higher ups in the Summoners' Hall, though her progress is said to have been halted by the incident she was involved in long ago. It's said that her power would increase exponentially if she could get over it. She also has the tendency to put a wall between herself and others which few are ever able to get over.
dictionary.evolution:
I can't forget that day.
That's why I've decided I must
live with this pain.
dictionary.fusion:
I guess even fools like
your can be useful sometimes.
Don't get so full of yourself!
dictionary.summon:
I'm not going back.
I will keep going forward.
I have your back.

dictionary.description: A Unit modeled after Seria, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall's Demon Slayers. Having slayed Algmos, her sworn enemy, Seria not only grew greatly as a Summoner, but as a person as well. Her already impressive abilities on the battlefield blossomed even further, and she became more level-headed, growing able to discern the true nature of things around her. However, it seems that Seria remains as bad-mouthed as ever.
dictionary.evolution:
I won't live in the past anymore.
I'll continue moving forward.
And you're coming with me!
dictionary.fusion:
You're lending me power? How sweet!
What? Not just to me?
I-I knew that, you idiot!
dictionary.summon:
I'll never forget the past.
But I have to treasure the present
because I'm still alive.

leader skill.desc: 모든 유닛 공격력과 방어력 30%상승＆하트 크리스탈 회복량 대폭 상승
leader skill.name: 귀신의 파동

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 22연속 데미지＆3턴간 자신의 공격 방어 회복력 대상승
sbb.name: 레바테인

dictionary.description: The third oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters who fought against the gods in order to save the humans. As clumsy as she was she loved how earnest humans were, and, in following her eldest sister Sola, she saved many. Her bright and sociable personality is said to have brought smiles back to the faces of many. It's also recorded that she had great love for her sisters. However, during the latter half of the great war she faced off against her sister Madia and the rest of the Fresh Blood Sisters.
dictionary.fusion:
How nice!
I completely forgot how good
it felt to fight alongside humans!
dictionary.summon:
Now I understand.
This is the warmth of humanity.
Let me fight with you!

dictionary.description: The third oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. During the latter half of the great war when Madia and her Fresh Blood Sisters were about to unleash on the humans, Sola, eldest of the six goddess sisters, led the resistance against them. Freya continued to save people as passionately as she had before, but she eventually came under fierce attack from her elder sister Eliza. Her beloved sister's blade cut deep into her body and down to her very soul.
dictionary.evolution:
My flames burn even stronger!
It seems my place is with you
all after all!
dictionary.fusion:
I still love all my sisters.
But still, I can't stop just yet.
They know exactly why...
dictionary.summon:
Behold my flames, Summoner!
I can burn even brighter if
you let me fight with you!

dictionary.description: The daughter of a prominent aristocrat from the La Veda Republic. She was unstoppable with her axe, but thanks to her overprotective upbringing she became quite self-centered. However, having recognized this herself as well, she came to extremely dislike getting involved with other people. Then one day she met a certain mechanical figure and her objective changed to battle. She would now face off against an evil force the likes of which had never been seen.
dictionary.fusion:
Are you kidding me!?
I'm the only one you
should be strengthening!
dictionary.summon:
How did 'you' summon me?
Whatever! If you don't keep me happy
I'll just go home!

dictionary.description: A lotus colored axe wielder and the daughter of a prominent aristocrat from the La Veda Republic. Continuing her journey with the mechanical figure from another world, she came to meet many new people. These people were of stronger character than anyone she'd met before, and through interacting with them her abilities grew even stronger. She then encountered the being she had set out to defeat, and, wielding her newfound powers, unleashed everything she had in a blaze of fury.
dictionary.evolution:
Hey, look at me!
This is who I really am!
Maybe I'm too bright to see?
dictionary.fusion:
Now you've got it!
You've no chance without me!
So what do you want me to do?
dictionary.summon:
Having summoned me,
you must be planning to fight?
Alright then! To the bitter end!

dictionary.description: A lotus colored axe wielder that battled with the ten-winged tormentor. Right when she and her companions thought they had defeated Melchio, a light from above restored him as if nothing had happened. Though her friends were frozen in despair, she charged straight at the enraged deity after cursing her friends for their cowardice. Seeing her brazen act had a bolstering effect on the rest of her party. Noticing this, she smiled at them before losing consciousness.
dictionary.evolution:
My spirit will keep on burning!
Doesn't matter if I turn into
a pile of ashes!
dictionary.fusion:
I'm not even close to done!
So don't waste your units
on anyone else!
dictionary.summon:
Looks like you've gotten
a lot stronger, too!
Okay, then.
Welcome to my world!

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛 5속성 이상일때 공격력50% 상승＆HP10% 상승
leader skill.name: 오광창신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 화속성 18연속 데미지＆3턴 공격력업＆공격에 화속성부여
sbb.name: 메기도 크로스

dictionary.description: Born from the eruption of a volcano, it is a creature made of coal that burns brightly. The Bozdells roam above the ground and are said to be nurtured by finding inflammable things and burning them up as nourishment. They are impartial to humans, but when sensing danger can release flammable gases and fire, thus discretion is advised. Rumor has it that they have settled down in a castle where a famous blacksmith resides, providing him with the intense heat needed for his craft.
dictionary.fusion:
Bombs! Bombs!
Delicious bombs!
dictionary.summon:
Bombs! Bombs!
Burn! Burn!
I burn them, and then eat them!

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 빛

dictionary.description: The king of the coal creatures who was miraculously born hundreds of years ago when a volcano erupted. It decided to use its fire powers after some humans tried to capture Bozdells. It is said that many Bozdells were trapped, but when the king suddenly appeared, he commanded all Bozdells to work together as brothers, and they managed to escape. At that moment, all of their kidnappers were turned into cinders. There are shocking tales regarding this creature like the one told above, but it actually seems to enjoy always being submerged in hot lava.
dictionary.evolution:
Bombs! Bombs!
Hmm?! Boom!
I've become a king.
dictionary.fusion:
Bombs are so delicious!
Gimme some more!
dictionary.summon:
Bombs...
Summoner,
could you take me to a pool of lava?

leader skill.desc: 스파크 시 부여 데미지 소폭 상승
leader skill.name: 중격의 빛

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 8연속 데미지＆3턴 스파크 시 데미지 상승
bb.name: 소돔 클레이모어

dictionary.description: A disastrous beast that long ago was a great threat to the Sama Kingdom. The embodiment of mayhem itself, even sturdy castles were turned to ash when he came raging in. In order to stop Homusubi from destroying the world, the gods utilized a powerful freezing weapon to seal away the majority of his power. However, even then the Fiery Beast continued to be a great threat, and it's been told there were many more kingdoms that experienced his rage.
dictionary.fusion:
Ha ha ha ha!
Take a look, Summoner!
My flames burn bright!
dictionary.summon:
Foolish Summoner!
You've awoken be once more!
You'll regret your arrogance!

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 10연속 데미지＆3턴 스파크 시 데미지 상승
bb.name: 히노카쿠츠치

dictionary.description: A disastrous beast that long ago was a great threat to the Sama Kingdom. Though the source of his power was sealed away by the Ice Keep, it was once again released by Elsel, the angel who rebelled against the gods. Now free, the beast whose blazing power rivaled the sun itself used his power to burn away the order the gods had brought to the land. Having turned countless cities to ash he was eventually taken out by a half human half mage girl and a massive magical beast, though there are many theories as to how this actually happened.
dictionary.evolution:
Ha ha ha ha!
I am destruction!
My flames end all!
dictionary.fusion:
What kind of fool would grant
more power to a beast like me?
Do you know something I don't?
dictionary.summon:
So you require a demon's aid?
To have summoned me, you
must be the real dangerous one.

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 11연속 데미지＆3턴 스파크 시 데미지 상승
bb.name: 이그니 샤그란

dictionary.description: A disastrous beast that, upon bringing destruction to the Sama Kingdom, raged out against the gods. Long asleep after having been defeated in battle, he was awoken once again after sensing the unrest that had gripped the world. He promptly began his attack on the gods, releasing his hell fire on them the moment he laid eyes on them. Though his cruel flames which turned the world into a sea of fire threatened the humans as well, records show they were protected by a great wall of earth and ice, and only the gods felt his wrath.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner of this disastrous beast!
I have come to admire you!
Allow me please to rage about!
dictionary.fusion:
That's it!
Heat me up even more!
I'll turn them all to ashes!
dictionary.summon:
That's right!
I should use my hell fire!
I'll destroy all you want me to!

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 15연속 데미지＆3턴 스파크 데미지와 크리티컬 확률 상승
sbb.name: 에님스 그리드

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 6연속 데미지&확률로 저주효과
bb.name: 귀인열화참

dictionary.description: A demon who once wielded flames in the Bariura Empire long ago. Having once served the empire himself, his life was changed when he received the armor known as Vishra. In exchange for great power the armor robs its user of their memory, cursing them to fight on endlessly. Though many lived in fear of the armored warrior who had slain countless brave souls, none knew how the man inside the armor was suffering.
dictionary.fusion:
Don't give me more power!
You must keep me from
causing any more harm!
dictionary.summon:
Summoner, do you know
who you've just called upon?
I cannot be controlled.

leader skill.desc: 공격 시 낮은 확률로 랜덤 상태이상 부여
leader skill.name: 악역의 파문

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 8연속 데미지&확률로 저주효과
bb.name: 귀신나찰참

dictionary.description: The former knight turned into an evil demon by the armor that curses any who wear it. Though the curse took away his sorrow, his former personality remained. Despite the deep regret he felt for his own actions many appeared before him in hopes of vanquishing him only to become sacrifices to his armor. It is said that the one to finally defeat him was a twin sword wielding warrior dressed in black armor. It is said that the evil demon seemed weakened during their battle, though even now none know why.
dictionary.evolution:
Have a look.
Human blood has added to
my armor's brilliant shine.
dictionary.fusion:
Stop it!
I'm going to lose control!
The demon inside is waking.
dictionary.summon:
Do you wish to command
even this cursed armor of mine?
Then I put my trust in you!

leader skill.desc: 공격 시 확률로 랜덤 상태이상 부여
leader skill.name: 악역의 만연

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 11연속 데미지＆확률로 저주효과
bb.name: 귀신나염황

dictionary.description: The former knight turned into an evil demon by the armor that curses any who wear it. In the midst of a fierce battle with one of his former friends, he regained his memories and escaped the death grip of the armor for an instant. A well-placed stab from his friend destroyed a piece of the armor, though his friend did not finish him off. Taking advantage of his friend's hesitation, the armor regained control of Vishra and caused him to flee. Legend has it that the armor somehow fixed itself and its owner, and was seen again in the war between the humans and the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
I am the demon Vishra!
Anything with a pulse
shall taste my blade!
dictionary.fusion:
That's it!
Give me more power!
I'll slash your enemies to pieces!
dictionary.summon:
Vishra is my name.
What's the matter?
Is my power burning your eyeballs?

leader skill.desc: 공격 시 확률로 랜덤으로 상태이상을 부여＆크리티컬 시 부여 데미지 업
leader skill.name: 마역신의 섬격

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 13연속 데미지＆3턴아군 전체에게 데미지 입을때 BB게이지 상승효과 부여
sbb.name: 진 귀신검

bb.desc: 적 전체에 화속성 9연속 데미지＆3턴 아군전체의 BB게이지 서서히 증가
bb.name: 링라이드 애쉬

dictionary.description: A soldier who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. Originally a member of the Agni Empire's knighthood, his valiant efforts during his battles against the god army were acknowledged by the general of the Agni army himself. However, after receiving a letter from his childhood friend Lucana, he left for home in a hurry. After learning about the upcoming great invasion of El Gaia from her, he planned to find refuge for the people of his hometown with the help of his friend Aneil.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm, what an interesting technique.
It's like power is boiling within me.
Now I'm ready to fight!
dictionary.summon:
Having trouble?
Leave it to me!
I'll help you out, you'll see!

leader skill.desc: 파티의 유닛이 6속성이상이면 공격력 방어력 회복력 최대HP 20%상승
leader skill.name: 육극의 멸광

bb.desc: 적 전체에 화속성 11연속 데미지＆3턴 아군전체의 BB게이지 서서히 증가
bb.name: 선레이드 글리터

dictionary.description: A soldier who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. It is said that he continuously led the fights against the god army when fleeing with his people towards El Gaia. Because of his positive and indomitable spirit, many people gathered under him relying on his power, including both people from his hometown and many refugees from all other regions. And as if answering his prayers, the gods gifted him with more power to continue protecting the people.
dictionary.evolution:
This is my new power!
The voices that cry for my help
make me stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
I wanna get stronger!
There are too many people out there
who still need my help!
dictionary.summon:
Leave the fighting to me!
I'll put my blade on the line
to protect you!

leader skill.desc: 파티의 유닛이 6속성이상이면 공격력 방어력 회복력 최대HP 25%상승
leader skill.name: 육극신의 멸광

dictionary.description: A member of a magical clan captured by the Agni Empire, Lyn manipulated a great fire strong enough to melt iron. Defeated by a high ranking priest, she had most of her powers sealed and was jailed. When the war with the gods began, she escaped. Unable to undo the seal, she vented her fury with what little magic she had, indiscriminately thrashing both humans and gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh! You want to give me power?
You're a strange one!
dictionary.summon:
You're a Summoner?
You need me even in my present state?
Let's wreak havoc together?

leader skill.desc: 크리티컬 시 부여 데미지 대폭  상승
leader skill.name: 섬격의 패인

dictionary.description: There's a story in Elgaia about a frog with a voracious appetite. It is said that this frog consumed the potential of people around it so that it could become king itself. However, after consuming so much potential it is said that other beings began targeting the frog in hopes of laying claim to its power. This voracious frog is now seen in Grand Gaia, though only very rarely. There is also a rumor that fusing with it could strengthen certain abilities...
dictionary.summon:
You're after my power too, human?
Ribbit, ribbit, ribbit!
Greedy as always, little human!

dictionary.description: An old legend passed down in Elgaia tells of a strong frog who shares a similar story to another creature there. According to the legend, when the gods used their powers to create the world, one being meant to keep their remaining power to himself. Trying to use such power for his own personal growth, rather than for the world's, the gods punished him by transforming him into a frog. Even as a frog, he still yearns for the power of creation, and thus is always targeted by others. When used as an ingredient for Fusion, it may lead to surprising beneficial effects.
dictionary.summon:
Croak?!
Someone's found me, ribbit!
What do you want with me, ribbit?

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 8연속 데미지&확률로 약화효과
bb.name: 불새

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 10연속 데미지&확률로 약화효과
bb.name: 남김없이 태우기

dictionary.description: The 12 Guardians of the Gods, made up of the most talented people from across every country. Farlon, one of the them, had absolute confidence in his abilities. As a young man he was usually very polite, but he was very competitive when it came to his comrades, and it's said he refused to open up to any of the other Guardians other than his sweetheart. It has also been told that he held strong ill will against the leader of the Guardians.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more magic power.
I'll prove to you that I am
the strongest around.
dictionary.summon:
Swordsman of the 12 Guardians!
That is who I am!
Be sure not to forget it!

dictionary.description: Wielding both blade and fire, he chased after the one who betrayed the Guardians. It's said that when a report came concerning the trator, Sodis, he was pleased by opportunity he'd been handed. He brushed off his sweetheart as she tried to stop him before heading off to vanquish Sodis, only to be defeated instead. It's even said that Sodis had to hold back so that he didn't accidentally kill him. His pride damaged and his anger out of control, Farlon then dedicated himself to defeating Sodis.
dictionary.evolution:
My flames grow stronger!
Still, I've yet a ways to go
before becoming the strongest!
dictionary.fusion:
I need more magic power!
Make me stronger!
I must redeem myself!
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner, I see.
I'll use anything at my disposal
to destroy him!

dictionary.description: Of of the 12 Guardians who wielded fire and his blade as he pursued the trators. Hearing that his girlfriend Ramna had betrayed the gods and left their land, filled with rage he chased after the trators, not even leaving time for his wounds to heal. He directed his angry flames toward his former allies who now sided with Sodis. It's said that even his girlfriend's heartfealt plea couldn't change his mind. In the end, no one knows upon whom or what his angry blade fell.
dictionary.evolution:
I will be the strongest!
Until then I must keep going forth.
My soul still burns strong!
dictionary.fusion:
Nngh, it's so hot!
This burning feeling inside of me
has ignited my soul!
dictionary.summon:
No one can quell my anger!
My flames will scorch everything!
It matters not who stands before me!

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 화속성 12연속 데미지＆3턴 자신의 방어력을 반감 후 공격력 대폭  상승
sbb.name: 크림존 윙

dictionary.description: This magical creature is said to systemize and store all Fire-related knowledge that Metal Units can hold within them. They may look gentle, but they are known for mercilessly criticizing anyone and everyone. Even the cynical Fire Ghosts get nervous and speechless around them. Though their harsh words may sound insulting at first, listen calmly and they insightful opinions on how to amend faults for the better. If you ever feel lost in life, you might want to seek one out.
dictionary.summon:
So you're a Summoner!
What's with that slack face!
Looks like I'll have to teach you!

dictionary.description: An incarnation of the power of Fire from another world. Legend has it these beings are the key to unlocking powers greater than those of the gods. A being made from the agglomeration of what we know as fire, they were originally intended to provide otherworldly gods with even more power. However, records state that unable to control the Mecha Gods, the gods destroyed them all. According to folklore, once fire completely consumes a single entity in ruin, the soul of the entity sublimates onto a higher plane. If one is able to control the power of a Mecha God, the power of limitless Fire may become theirs.
dictionary.summon:
You summon the power of Fire...
Are you prepared to face
your own actions?

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 화속성6연속 데미지＆3턴 방어력 상승
bb.name: 댄싱 소드

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, protectors of the land of the gods. Girlfriend of Farlon, another of the 12 Guardians. Loved by all, it's said she always retained hope even when confronted with hardship, reassuring her allies with her smile. Her fire blade technique known as the "Fire Step" which she created using a unique rythmn was hard for even advanced warriors to evade. It's said that even the hard-headed, self-important Farlon couldn't refuse her requests.
dictionary.fusion:
My flames have grown stronger.
I bear my soul in this fiery dance.
This feels so very good!
dictionary.summon:
My fiery blade bear my passion!
I will use it to rip all to shreds!
Pretty powerful, don't you think?

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 9연속 데미지＆3턴 방어력 상승
bb.name: 로드널

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who attempted to put a hault to the gods' plan to destroy the humans. Worried about her lover she followed him as he set off to vanquish the traitor, but she instead came face to face with him in the wake of her lover's defeat. Upon asking why he'd rejected the gods, his reasoning made her decide to join him in his fight. She also determined that she would try to convince her lover as well, who would surely come to attack the traitor again once he was healed.
dictionary.evolution:
The more I look at you,
the less I'm able to resist.
Alright, let's give it our best!
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you!
I'll try even harder now!
Alright, let's go!
dictionary.summon:
The more we talk the more
I think I'm able to understand you.
That's why I believe in you.

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 11연속 데미지＆3턴 방어력 상승
bb.name: 크라임 베리엣

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who attempted to stop the gods' plan to destroy the humans. Leaving the land of the gods as a traitor, her lover, now her enemy, appeared before her. Clashing swords with a man who now saw her as a traitor, she risked her life trying to persuade him to change. There is no record depicting how the volcanic clashing of these star-crossed lovers ended. However, a recently discovered diary suggests that they may have possibly made up in the end.
dictionary.evolution:
Do you believe in the
power of the love like I do?
Look how strong it's made me!
dictionary.fusion:
I like strong people,
but what is left for someone who's
surpassed everyone before them?
dictionary.summon:
I'll show you my secret fire dance!
No one can stop me now!
Alright then, here I go!

leader skill.desc: 목속성 유닛에게 받은 데미지 15%경감＆화속성 유닛 목속성 유닛부여 데미지상승
leader skill.name: 목신의 단죄

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 13연속 데미지＆3턴 방어력 상승＆ 화속성 유닛의 공격력업
sbb.name: 화장원무

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 화속성 8연속 데미지＆3턴 공격에 뇌속성부여
bb.name: 비주 일「파리카」

dictionary.description: A mage residing in the outskirts of the Agni Empire, she learned the dark arts from her grandmother at a very young age. At the age of 14, she was blossoming into a powerful sorceress alongside her baby fire dragon Grazool, when her grandmother passed away. In her grandmother's storage closet was a vast library of both grimoires and romance novels. Her flashy way of dressing is either from the influence of her late grandmother or these books, but it has become commonplace for her nonetheless.
dictionary.fusion:
Is fusion supposed to tickle?
There's nothing in Grandma's books
about this!
dictionary.summon:
Watch where you're climbing,
Grazool! Oh, you just wanna meet
our new friend too, huh?

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 화속성 11연속 데미지＆3턴 공격에 뇌속성부여
bb.name: 비주 이「루가나」

dictionary.description: A mage raised in the outskirts of the Agni Empire. One day, a letter of summons arrived from the Atharva Republic, claiming her late grandmother had leaked imperial secrets. Hoping to clear her grandmother's name, she headed to the capital along with her faithful dragon Grazool. There, she had the shocking realization that her grandmother had been a famous Atharvaian sorceress. Through fighting off the gods' attacks in this complex emotional state, she realized she was far superior to any normal human mage.
dictionary.evolution:
Think I'm pretty tough?
That means my grandma was
incredible!
dictionary.fusion:
It feels stuffy in here...
Either 'cause Grazool got bigger...
Or my outfit got tighter...
dictionary.summon:
I call the shots around here.
You didn't summon me...
I summoned you!

bb.desc: 적 전체에게 랜덤으로 화속성 14연속 데미지＆3턴 공격에 뇌속성부여
bb.name: 비주 삼「폴톤」

dictionary.description: A mage raised in the outskirts of the Agni Empire. Her bravery in battle against the gods struck the fancy of Knight Agni, who invited her to join the Imperial Army. However, she refused, instead heading onward to her late grandmother's mansion in the Atharva Republic to find out more about her childhood hero. It was there she found her grandmother's hidden diary, containing the secrets of her birth. That was all it took for her and Grazool to charge straight at the gods at breakneck speed.
dictionary.evolution:
Hmm... I can feel all sorts of bits
and pieces of power flowing
through me...
dictionary.fusion:
We're both getting stronger.
But the sky's the limit,
so keep at it!
dictionary.summon:
Whoever's descendant I am,
I'll always be my grandma's girl!
And I'll always be myself!

leader skill.desc: 파티 유닛 5속성 이상일때 공격력50% 상승＆BB상승량 상승
leader skill.name: 오광전신의 힘

sbb.desc: 적 전체에게 강력한 화속성 16연속 데미지＆3턴 공격에 뇌속성부여＆3턴BC출현률 상승
sbb.name: 금단의 주문 「메자크라논」

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 6연속 데미지＆확률로 마비＆약화효과
bb.name: 소드 어브레이션

dictionary.description: A fire god who tried to rebel against the higher ranking gods and paid for his transgression through a long period of incarceration. Although originally a lower ranking god, he drew the attention of the other gods thanks to his destructive ability on the battlefield. During the war with the humans, he was released in order to serve at the front lines. To him, fighting and destroying were his life, so he is said to have gladly taken the role he was given.
dictionary.fusion:
What...? I'm swelling up with power!
But this is not enough.
I need more!
Hand it over!
dictionary.summon:
To think I was summoned by a human.
Be as careful as you can when avoiding my whirling flames!

bb.desc: 적 개인에게 강력한 화속성 10연속 데미지＆확률로 마비＆약화효과
bb.name: 그라디스 놀

dictionary.description: A fire god who tried to rebel against the higher ranking gods and paid for his transgression through a long period of incarceration. During the great war he continued to battle from the front lines, preferring to attack capital cities with gigantic fortresses and other similar places.
